input_text:
Job Title: Test Automation Engineer

Location: Boston, MA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology, Other

Description:
Job Title: Test Automation EngineerLocation: Boston MA 02110 (Hybrid onsite - Tue/Wed/Thu)Onsite Requirements:
  Top Skill #1 - MUST have Investment Service Industry experience. Top Skill #2 - Ideal candidate will have experience working with CRD/CRIMS (Charles River Development) order management system (OMS), or a similar order management system. Top Skill #3 - Highly technical, coding will be required.Top Skill #4: looking for a test automation engineer who can help establish the initial framework and move automation efforts forward. Develop a roadmap and timeline for establishing a test automation framework.
 Job Scope: They are moving from on prem to cloud and do not have an automation framework in place yet.Looking for a test automation engineer who can help establish the initial framework and move automation efforts forward. Develop a roadmap and timeline for establishing a test automation framework at the company.Contribute to the development of a plan to integrate automated testing within the testing process.Participate in the evaluation of tools and technology for automation that best fits the organization and projects therein. They will contribute to creating an approach and methodology for building a test automation architecture.Design and develop (new or modified) test automation solutions that meet the business needs and bring value to the business.Enable the transition of testing from a manual to an automated approach.They will participate in creating automated test reporting and metrics collection.Finally, the Test Automation Engineer will help to manage and optimize our testing assets to facilitate maintainability and address evolving test systems.Responsibilities:Designing, developing, and maintaining test automation solutions, Automate dynamic, functional tests.Contribute to organizational and/or project Test Automation StrategyPrimarily focus on repeatable tasks withing the SUT or project and designing an automation framework to support.Maximize test coverage for the most critical features of the SUT or project.Write documentation for automated processes.Build test automation frameworks.Participate in and contribute to defect management process.Work cross collaboratively on CI/CD pipelines.Exploratory testing as needed and/or required.Skills You Bring:
 Broad knowledge of testingIn depth understanding of test automationAbility to influence the direction that an organization/project takes when designing, developing, and maintaining test automation solutions for functional tests.Experience w/ Agile methodologyTechnical Skills: Python, Java, SQL, and LinuxAnalytical Skills:
 Prioritize overall needs of the organization or project to determine the biggest value of what can be automated.Communication Skills: Effectively collaborate with stakeholders so they understand, and we can have common alignment on objective, function, goal, and reporting.Tools:JiraPyTestCucumberNice to have:
 Prior experience with asset management, trading, or portfolio management platformsExperience w/ AWS.5 - 10+ years of experience in test automationExperience with Charles River DevelopmentXray Test ManagementExperience w/ Rest Assured, Playwright, SeleniumEducation:BS/MS in Computer Science

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Test Automation Engineer
output_json.summary:
Job Title: Test Automation Engineer
Location: Boston, MA
Employment Type: full-time
job_responsibilities: Contribute to the development of a plan to integrate automated testing within the testing process.
Participate in the evaluation of tools and technology for automation that best fits the organization and projects therein.
Design and develop (new or modified) test automation solutions that meet the business needs and bring value to the business.
Enable the transition of testing from a manual to an automated approach.
Participate in creating automated test reporting and metrics collection.
Help to manage and optimize testing assets to facilitate maintainability and address evolving test systems.

other.content:
Broad knowledge of testing
In depth understanding of test automation
Ability to influence the direction that an organization/project takes when designing, developing, and maintaining test automation solutions for functional tests.
Experience w/ Agile methodology
Prioritize overall needs of the organization or project to determine the biggest value of what can be automated.
Effectively collaborate with stakeholders so they understand, and we can have common alignment on objective, function, goal, and reporting.
Jira, PyTest, Cucumber, Rest Assured, Playwright, Selenium, Xray Test Management, Charles River Development
5 - 10+ years of experience in test automation
